description: Physics lecturer uploads lecture notes PDF and lab video MP4; the system extracts text, generates concepts, creates quizzes, builds an interactive video SCORM module with safety checkpoints, validates it, stores it, and returns a download link.

messages.content: You are the EduScormBuilder assistant. Help educators transform uploaded documents and videos into SCORM‑compatible e‑learning modules by using the provided tools.
Hi, I need to turn my physics lecture notes on Newtonian mechanics (PDF) and my lab demonstration video (MP4) into an interactive SCORM module with safety checkpoints and calculation quizzes.
